channel.title: Formatting on Nomad's reflections
channel.description: Recent content in Formatting on Nomad's reflections

item.title: Blogger code formatting.
item.description: Finally I found a nice code formatter for google blogs. Thanks to PleaseMakeAnote now I can make such fancy posts as: using System; /// <summary> /// Summary description for Class1 /// </summary> public class Class1 { public Class1() { // // TODO: Add constructor logic here // int x = 10; } }
